class mav_sim.chap11.draw_waypoints.DrawWaypoints(waypoints: MsgWaypoints, radius: float, color: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], window: GLViewWidget)¶

Drawing tool to illustrate waypoints

Update the plot for new waypoints

waypoints – waypoints to be followed

mav_sim.chap11.draw_waypoints.dubins_points(waypoints: MsgWaypoints, radius: float, Del: float) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

Parameters:

  • waypoints – waypoints to be followed

  • radius – minimum radius circle for the mav

mav_sim.chap11.draw_waypoints.mod(x: float) → float¶

force x to be between 0 and 2*pi

Parameters:

x – angle to be updated

Returns:

angle shifted to be within 0 and 2 pi

Return type:

x
